title: Carbon–concentration and carbon–climate feedbacks in CMIP6 models and their comparison to CMIP5 models
description: Conducted the GFDL Earth System Model version 4.1 (GFDL-ESM4.1) simulations analyzed in the study and provided interpretation and analysis of the different vegetation and land use implementations across the multi-model ensemble.
contributionStatement: Conducted the GFDL Earth System Model version 4.1 (GFDL-ESM4.1) simulations analyzed in the study and provided interpretation and analysis of the different vegetation and land use implementations across the multi-model ensemble. (D=5\% / W=5\%)
